src:
Hasil Imbang Lawan Bali United Jadi Modal Persela Hadapi Barito Putera
01 Nov 2019, 09:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persela Lamongan berhasil membawa pulang satu poin dari lawatannya ke markas Bali United, Kamis (31/10/2019) malam. Laskar Joko Tingkir menahan imbang tuan rumah dengan skor 1-1.
Keberhasilan tersebut mendapat apresiasi dari pelatih Persela, Nil Maizar. Sebab, mereka datang ke Bali dalam kondisi yang tidak komplet dan baru saja kalah dari Kalteng Putra.
"Saya apresiasi kepada seluruh pemain dengan segala kekurangannya mereka mampu menunjukkan bahwa mereka memang layak untuk diperhitungkan di liga ini," kata Nil Maizar.
Ada empat pemain kunci yang absen ketika Persela menghadapi Bali United di laga pekan ke-25 Liga 1 2019. Mereka adalah Rafael Gomes de Oliviera, Eky Taufik Febrianto, Demerson Bruno Costa, dan M. Zaenuri.
"Ini memberikan motivasi buat kita tim Lamongan sehingga bisa mendapatkan poin demi poin," Nil menambahkan.
"Mudah-mudahan anak-anak lebih semangat lagi apalagi untuk menghadapi Barito Putera besok tanggal 4 November," lanjutbya

text:
Results of Draw Against Bali United Become Persela's Capital to Face Barito Putera
Nov 1, 2019, 09:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persela Lamongan managed to bring home one point from his visit to the headquarters of Bali United, Thursday (10/31/2019) night. Laskar Joko Tingkir drew home with a score of 1-1.
This success was appreciated by Persela's coach, Nil Maizar. Because, they came to Bali in incomplete conditions and had just lost to Kalteng Putra.
"I appreciate all the players with all their shortcomings they were able to show that they really deserve to be taken into account in this league," Nil Maizar said.
There were four key players who were absent when Persela faced Bali United in matchday 25 of League 1 2019. They were Rafael Gomes de Oliviera, Eky Taufik Febrianto, Demerson Bruno Costa, and M. Zaenuri.
"This provides motivation for us Lamongan team so they can get point by point," Nil added.
"Hopefully the children will be even more excited, especially to face Barito Putera tomorrow, November 4," he continued
